page.title: 06Weekday family life
page.content: When we start school we have an assembly,then when we come in we either read or do our timetables.My favourite subjects are maths,history and geography.My worst subject is science.School dinners are at quarter past twelve.I enjoy cooked dinners and chips,but my sister is choosy and only likes chips.When we get home my mum is usually watching Sons and Daughters or Young Docters.On Monday we have piano lessons for three quarters of an hour each,my sister Kathryn is on grade 1 and I am on grade lV we will be having our examinations in June .In the evening we have tea and watch the television we enjoy watching Dynasty,Dallas,Eastenders and Roll Over Beethoven.They are our favourite programmes,we go to bed at nine o'clock but mum and dad go later.We read for an hour and then go to sleep.
